00003 class zcomponent
00004 {
00005 public:
00006   ///////////////////////////////////////////////
00007   /////////////////// objects ///////////////////
00008   ///////////////////////////////////////////////

00011   comple v; //!< value of the component
00012

00031 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00032   s << "(" << c.i << ", " << c.j << ",  " << c.v << ")" << std::flush;

00041 /*! lessthan function for i of zcomponent */
00042 inline bool ilt(const zcomponent& a, const zcomponent& b)
00043 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00044   return a.i < b.i;
00045 }
00046 
00047 //=============================================================================
00048 /*! lessthan function for j of zcomponent */
00049 inline bool jlt(const zcomponent& a, const zcomponent& b)
00050 {VERBOSE_REPORT;
00051   return a.j < b.j;
00052 }
